name: U-01 / Ritual Ring
shortDescription: Hammered silver with intentional chaos. Worn like armor.
description: A statement ring with rough, textured surfaces that catch light from every angle. Each piece is unique, hammered by hand to create intentional imperfections. This is jewelry that tells a story.

name: U-02 / Static Chain
shortDescription: Bold, chunky links. Urban nights captured in silver.
description: Inspired by city infrastructure and industrial design, this chain makes a statement without saying a word. Heavy, solid, and built to last.

name: U-03 / City Cuff
shortDescription: Geometric ear cuff. Futuristic minimal design.
description: A single piece that wraps around the ear without piercing. Clean lines meet sculptural form. Wear on either ear, stack with others, make it yours.

name: U-04 / Echo Bracelet
shortDescription: Chunky, distressed, unapologetic. Pure controlled chaos.
description: Heavy silver with a brushed, industrial finish. This bracelet has weight, presence, and attitude. It's not subtle, and that's the point.

name: U-05 / Signal Ring
description: A cleaner take on our signature style. Polished silver with subtle texture that reveals itself in the right light. Everyday luxury.

name: U-06 / Night Ring
shortDescription: Wide band. Bold statement. City energy.
description: A wider band for those who want their jewelry to be seen and felt. Textured surface catches light like city streets in the rain.
